> Elder listened to Legacy over the commlink. He knew what needed to be don=
e.
> The Matrix Quest would have to be abandoned for now. They must destroy=
 these
> two Minions quickly and go to the Black Fortress to aid the Maxima=
l rescue team... 
> and the Predacons. There was just one thing about Legac=
y's statement that 
> took=A0over Elder's thoughts.
> 
> Elder: Corrupted R=
odimus? What do you mean? We thought that he and Nightlight
> were just bei=
ng held captive by the Predacons.
=A0
Legacy paused for a moment as he atte=
mpted to put his historical information into succinct terms. =93THE AUTOBOT=
 KNOWN AS HOTROD, THROUGH SOME UNKNOWN MEANS WAS RECONFIGURED INTO A BEING =
KNOWN AS DARK RODIMUS. IN FACT IT WAS BECAUSE OF THIS THAT RODIMUS PRIME CO=
ULD NOT BERECOVERED, WHICH LEAD IN LARGE PART TO THE DEFEAT OF THE CYBERTRO=
NIAN FORCES HERE ON EARTH . . . AND BEYOND.=94
=A0
Legacy paused as if chec=
king his records, =93INTERESTINGLY, HE WAS NOT PRESENT AT THE INITIAL ONSLA=
UGHT OF CYCLONUS ON THE BLACK FORTRESS. CONJECTURAL ANALYSIS PUT HIM IN ATL=
ANTIS AT THE TIME.=94
=A0
Legacy moved higher into the air as if prepared t=
o fire on the fleeing minions, but instead did something else. With a corus=
cating beam of power he fired a radio wave blast at the duo, not attempting=
 to destroy them in this maneuver, but to cut off communication=92s with an=
yone else. 
=A0
((OOC: I am not sure if anyone is familiar with Shockblast =
=96 the character Legacy is loosely based on, but he has the ability to hac=
k communications and shut off communications systems . . . among other thin=
gs))
=A0
Preston
(Legacy)
